CustomField.description:
NICC-042337 Synchronous: the connection remains open until the transaction is completed; message delivered and response is returned.
Asynchronous: the message is delivered; message acknowledged; connection drops; the response message is sent on a new connection. Asynchronous is preferred as it is more efficient.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Synchronous: the connection remains open until the transaction is completed; message delivered and response is returned. Asynchronous: the message is delivered; message acknowledged; connection drops; the response message is sent on a new connection.
CustomField.label: Communication
